source: The Seasiders struck with the first real chance after 12 minutes as Nathan Delfouneso jinked past his man and delivered a pinpoint chip into the area, where Jamille Matt turned the ball home from three yards. Blackpool goalkeeper Sam Slocombe denied Matthew Briggs with a sensational save to push the ball behind after 17 minutes, but the visitors did equalise from the resulting corner as Kurtis Guthrie prodded in from close range after a goalmouth scramble. Somehow, Colchester failed to re-take the lead on the stroke of half-time as Slocombe produced a brilliant save from George Elokobi's close-range effort, before Guthrie headed against the bar from two yards. Blackpool should have clinched the win 15 minutes from time, as Tom Aldred was found unmarked from a corner, but he headed wide from eight yards. Colchester finished the game with 10 men, after substitute Sean Murray was shown a straight red for a bad tackle on Jim McAlister in injury time. summary: In a football match between Blackpool and Colchester United, the score ended 1-1. The first goal was scored by Jamille Matt for Blackpool after 12 minutes, assisted by Nathan Delfouneso. Colchester equalized after a goalmouth scramble from a corner kick. Both teams had several opportunities to score, with saves from the goalkeepers and missed shots. Blackpool had a chance to win the game with a header from Tom Aldred, but he missed. Colchester finished the game with 10 men after substitute Sean Murray was shown a red card for a bad tackle. There were several yellow cards given to players from both teams for fouls. The match ended with both teams unable to secure a win.

summary: Blackpool and Colchester United tied 1-1. Blackpool scored first after 12 minutes when Nathan Delfouneso passed to Jamille Matt, who scored. Colchester tied the game after 17 minutes when Kurtis Guthrie scored after a goalmouth scramble. Colchester had a chance to take the lead before halftime, but Blackpool's goalkeeper Sam Slocombe made a save. Blackpool had a chance to win the game 15 minutes before the end, but Tom Aldred missed a header. Colchester finished the game with 10 men after Sean Murray was red-carded for a bad tackle.

source: The Seasiders struck with the first real chance after 12 minutes as Nathan Delfouneso jinked past his man and delivered a pinpoint chip into the area, where Jamille Matt turned the ball home from three yards. Blackpool goalkeeper Sam Slocombe denied Matthew Briggs with a sensational save to push the ball behind after 17 minutes, but the visitors did equalise from the resulting corner as Kurtis Guthrie prodded in from close range after a goalmouth scramble. Somehow, Colchester failed to re-take the lead on the stroke of half-time as Slocombe produced a brilliant save from George Elokobi's close-range effort, before Guthrie headed against the bar from two yards. Blackpool should have clinched the win 15 minutes from time, as Tom Aldred was found unmarked from a corner, but he headed wide from eight yards. Colchester finished the game with 10 men, after substitute Sean Murray was shown a straight red for a bad tackle on Jim McAlister in injury time. summary: The passage describes a football match between Blackpool and Colchester United. Blackpool took the lead with a goal from Jamille Matt, but Colchester equalized through Kurtis Guthrie. Both teams had chances to score, with Blackpool missing a good opportunity to win the game. Colchester finished the match with 10 men after Sean Murray was shown a red card for a bad tackle. The match ended in a 1-1 draw.

summary: The match between Blackpool and Colchester United ended in a 1-1 draw. Blackpool took the lead after 12 minutes with a goal from Jamille Matt, assisted by Nathan Delfouneso. Colchester equalized five minutes later through Kurtis Guthrie following a corner. Blackpool's goalkeeper, Sam Slocombe, made several crucial saves, including a notable one from George Elokobi just before halftime. Blackpool missed a key chance to win when Tom Aldred headed wide from a corner. Colchester ended the game with 10 men after Sean Murray was sent off for a bad tackle in injury time.
